saving_throw: Will half (harmless) or Will half; see text
name: Cure Light Wounds, Mass
text: You channel positive energy to cure 1d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +25) on each selected creature. Like other cure spells, mass cure light wounds deals damage to undead in its area rather than curing them. Each affected undead may attempt a Will save for half damage.

effects.text: one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
effects.name: Target
